name: The Piano Past
description:
All old composer's piano sheets have been lost in the darkness... , neglected and not listened to , forgotten , fading away...  But! , now there's hope : you "the hero" comes to revive these old piano sheets and bringing them to the light again!!

W , D , A , S - Movement

Left Shift - Sprint 

Escape Key - Pause

Game Mechanics : You have to find out ;) 

You can choose any level to play! , the levels are basically a speed run that you have to finish till the end of these levels to get the piano sheets before the time runs out , that time depends on the piano sheet's length

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you want to support the developer join our discord server right here!  https://discord.gg/cTfQe4R 
and also check out the gamejolt page! https://gamejolt.com/games/Thepianopast/462096
